banner.name: I'm Otar Mamatsashvili
banner.about: Hello and thank you for visiting my portfolio website. Dive into a space that reflects my professional journey, showcases my expertise, and invites you to get in touch if you find my work compelling.

techStack.title: My Tech Stack
techStack.description: Technologies Iâ€™ve been working with recently

details: Learned programming principles and new emerging technologies.
Created several production-ready applications with fluency in modern front-end and back-end frameworks.
Worked under the mentorship of experienced web developers.
Coded using HTML, CSS and JavaScript to create responsive pages and components for the company website.
Worked cooperatively in a team with business people, designers and developers in a deadline-driven environment.

institutions.title: BACHELOR OF ENGINEERING IN INFORMATICS
details: Awarded a diploma with honors, graduating with a final GPA of 3.55.
Important courses covered: Calculus, Data structures and algorithms, HTML/CSS & Javascript, React, Linux, UX/UI, English B2 and C1 levels.

institutions.title: School Graduate
details: Awarded with gold medal for successful graduation.
Earned a laptop in 9th grade for top grades in all subjects.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description1: FolkSoul is a music band website, where you can view information about the band and its members. Only authenticated admins can modify this information.
projects.description2: Backend API for folksoul application, where information is stored and retrieved from mongo database.
projects.description3: Coronatime is a  website where you can register/login and then view covid statistics by country or worldwide summed up data.
projects.description4: This is covid questionnaire for company employees where they fill in data of their covid related information.
projects.description5: This is a survey created for Redberry(Georgian Tech Company) internship program. Here you answer questions about you.
projects.description6: Company backend API, where you can read, add, update and delete information about companies and employees.
projects.description7: Simple todo list where you can save todos, mark them completed and delete useless ones.
projects.description8: Tribute page for Aleksandre Kartvelishvili, Georgian aircraft designer. One page application with simple styling and parallax scrolling.

name.min: Name must contain at least 2 characters.

message.min: Message must contain at least 3 characters.
